document_data.mainbody:
easuring cups were a type of cookware container in the Realms, used to measure the volume of liquid or dry ingredients.
Sometime in the 14 century DR, the cargo ship The Gentle Lady was delivering a shipment of farmer and merchant goods to a small coastal community in the Dragon Reach. Among the goods being carried by the ship was a crate full of cookware that included eleven tin measuring cups.
